Comment: It actually divides and outrages a lot of Americans who live along the Gulf of Mexico and have called it that their entire lives.  It annoys, irritates and inflames our historical foreign allies and trading partners, particularly Mexico, even though internationally it will still be known as the Gulf of Mexico.  It will just cause more division and disagreement between and amongst Americans and our foreign allies.
